data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Dowa, Malawi to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dowa, Malawi
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 818,866 believers in Dowa to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Dowa, Malawi find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Dowa, Malawi, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Kachchi people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Kachchi people know you.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Dowa.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Dowa, Malawi humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Dowa.
